data.headline: DOWNASDAQS&P 500RUSSELL 2000DOW - Stock Price Chart
bullets: Nvidia rally and reports of expanded chip sales to Meta spark a broad semiconductor and software surge, with CDNS up 7%, SNPS up 3%, MU up 5.9%, and PLTR higher while PANW lags
S&P 500 gains about 0.4%, Nasdaq rises 0.6–0.7%, Dow up 0.1–0.2%, and Russell 2000 adds 0.2%
AI selloff fears ease, fueling renewed interest in tech and AI-related names
January FOMC minutes reveal a policy divide, with some officials open to rate cuts if inflation falls but others warning of persistent inflation and rich valuations, especially in AI
Treasury yields remain near multi-week lows, supporting risk assets
The dollar stays firm, gold holds near recent highs, and copper climbs, reflecting mixed macro sentiment
Traders focus on AI sentiment, sector rotation, geopolitics including Iran headlines, and upcoming PCE inflation data as the next major catalyst
